content:
Upgrading to Comfort+ on Delta Flight 2422 will definitely make your journey more comfortable.

To upgrade your seat using your miles, follow these steps:

**Step 1: Log in to your Delta account**

Go to Delta's website ([www.delta.com](http://www.delta.com)) and log in to your SkyMiles account using your username and password.

**Step 2: View your trip details**

Click on "My Trips" and select your upcoming flight, Delta Flight 2422, from JFK to DEN.

**Step 3: Check upgrade availability**

Look for the "Upgrade" or "Upgrade with Miles" button on your trip details page. If upgrade space is available, you'll see the option to upgrade to Comfort+.

**Step 4: Select your upgrade option**

Click on the "Upgrade" button, and you'll be taken to a page showing the upgrade options. Select "Comfort+" as your preferred upgrade.

**Step 5: Review the upgrade details**

Review the upgrade details, including the number of miles required, any additional fees, and the upgraded seat details.

**Step 6: Confirm the upgrade**

If you're satisfied with the upgrade details, click "Confirm Upgrade" to complete the process.

**Step 7: Review your updated itinerary**

Once the upgrade is confirmed, review your updated itinerary to ensure everything looks correct.

**Tips and Reminders:**

* Make sure you have enough miles in your account to cover the upgrade.
* Be aware of any additional fees associated with the upgrade, such as taxes or seat selection fees.
* If you're traveling with companions, you may need to upgrade their seats separately.
* Upgrades are subject to availability, so act quickly to secure your spot.

If you encounter any issues or have questions during the upgrade process, you can contact Delta's customer service or visit a Delta ticket counter at the airport.

By following these steps, you should be able to upgrade your seat to Comfort+ using your miles. Enjoy your more comfortable flight to Denver!
